heading: Frequently Asked Questions

questions.question: What types of gift hampers do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer a wide range of curated and customizable hampers including Corporate Gift Hampers, Festive Gifting Sets, Employee Joining Kits, Training Institute Kits, Birthday Hampers, Anniversary Hampers, Baby Shower Gifts, Award Ceremony Hampers and more. We help you design hampers based on purpose, branding, theme and budget.

questions.question: Can I customize my gift hamper?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Customization is one of our core strengths. You can choose products, packaging style, colour theme, branding, inserts, name tags and personalised messages. Our team will help you design a hamper that aligns perfectly with your brand or event theme.

questions.question: What is your delivery timeframe?
questions.answer: Our standard production & delivery timeline is 5-10 working days depending on the order size and customization level. Bulk orders or fully branded kits may require additional time. We also provide express delivery options for urgent requirements.

questions.question: Do you offer bulk discounts for corporate orders?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide attractive pricing and discount slabs for bulk orders. Discounts vary depending on the quantity, product type, branding and packaging requirements. Contact us with your quantity to get the best pricing.

questions.question: What are your payment options?
questions.answer: We accept UPI, bank transfer, credit/debit cards and digital wallet payments. For bulk and corporate orders, we follow a 50% advance policy and the balance amount before dispatch. Payment terms may vary based on project size and customization.

questions.question: Do you ship to other cities?
questions.answer: Yes, we deliver PAN India! Shipping charges may vary based on order size and destination. We work with reliable courier partners to ensure safe & timely delivery of hampers across the country.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my order?
questions.answer: Customer experience matters to us. If you receive a product with damage or quality concerns, notify us within 24 hours of delivery with photos or videos. We will resolve it through replacement, repair or compensation based on the case.

questions.question: How far in advance should I place my order?
questions.answer: We recommend placing custom or bulk orders at least 7-14 days in advance. Since we deal in Minimum Order Quantity of 50 units, early confirmation helps us in branding, assembly, quality checks and timely delivery. Rush orders can also be taken based on availability.
